scripts.setup:
# Set bash as default shell
sed -i 's|/bin/ash|/bin/bash|g' /etc/passwd

# Upgrade pip
pip3 install --upgrade pip

# Create workspace
mkdir -p /workspace
scripts.postInstall:
# Clean up cache
rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

# Show Python version
python3 --version
pip3 --version

echo "Alpine Python environment ready!"
